title: 2019–20 Ford Trophy
text:
The 2019–20 Ford Trophy was the 49th season of <a href="The%20Ford%20Trophy">The Ford Trophy</a>, the <a href="List%20A%20cricket">List A cricket</a> tournament in <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>. It was the ninth in a sponsorship deal between <a href="New%20Zealand%20Cricket">New Zealand Cricket</a> and <a href="Ford%20Motor%20Company">Ford Motor Company</a>. It took place between November 2019 and February 2020. As per the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Ford%20Trophy">previous edition</a> of the competition, the tournament featured ten rounds of matches. <a href="Wellington%20cricket%20team">Wellington</a> were the defending champions.
Following the conclusion of the group stage, <a href="Auckland%20cricket%20team">Auckland</a> advanced directly to the final, with <a href="Canterbury%20cricket%20team">Canterbury</a> and <a href="Otago%20cricket%20team">Otago</a> progressing to the elimination final. In the elimination final, Otago beat Canterbury by six runs to progress to the final. In the final, Auckland beat Otago by two wickets to win the tournament.
Points table.
 Teams qualified for the finals
